bioconda.name: bioconductor-scran
bioconda.summary: Methods for Single-Cell RNA-Seq Data Analysis

biotools.summary: Implements a variety of low-level analyses of single-cell RNA-seq data. Methods are provided for normalization of cell-specific biases, assignment of cell cycle phase, and detection of highly variable and significantly correlated genes.

bioschemas.name: scran
bioschemas.summary: Implements a variety of low-level analyses of single-cell RNA-seq data. Methods are provided for normalization of cell-specific biases, assignment of cell cycle phase, and detection of highly variable and significantly correlated genes.
